title: I released Aerle in January and added the 4-font thin family this week
content:
So far the response has been good and I find it very useful with my low x-height book serif family Artimas.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414033725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AerleBillboard_4994.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414033725im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AerleThinBillboard_4931.jpg)
author: David Bergsland
